column4: i have mounted my fat32 partition, but i can only write in it if im not in any folder, for example i can write on /mnt/Win_C/ but not on /mnt/win_C/hello... what am i doing wrong?
make sure you have nothing open in /mnt/win_C.
are you IRCing from the same machine?
close your terminal. Open a new one
do you want to be able to access this all the time?
do you want to access this drive whenever you reboot?
would recommend setting that up and rebooting
any reason to not follow the ubuntuguide?
but i need the fstab lines
